data.text: Starting 26June, #AirFrance will resume operations on the Paris, CDG - Chennai route. Chennai will be the 4th  gateway for Air France in India & will be served with a weekly direct flight. Customers from Chennai can fly to Paris starting 28 June. More info https://t.co/HySx21rUDv https://t.co/3asnH9SaZW

urls.title: Covid 19 : International travel
urls.description: From the onset of the crisis, the port health control mechanism helped to protect our health system and hold back the introduction into the national territory of variants with alarming features. Mobilising on a weekly basis up to 6,000 members of the civil security service to carry out tests, border guards to check travellers’ health documents and internal security forces to oversee the isolation or quarantine measures decreed by the prefects, this mechanism was duly adjusted in response to the changing

data.text: @priyotosh_sahoo Thank you for reaching out to us. In compliance with the guidelines issued by The Ministry of Civil Aviation, passengers travelling ex India are required to carry negative RT-PCR report with a QR code. This is a mandatory requirement & non-compliance will lead to denied boarding.
